Name: Dole Whip Pineapple
Details: This Dole Whip Pineapple Upside-Down Cake is the perfect refreshing Disney snack that you have to try on your next visit to the parks!

Name: Pizza Spring Rolls
Details: The Spring Rolls at this cart are the perfect savory snack to take on the go while you are waiting in line for the next ride. The Pizza flavor is a classic, and with two rolls per order, this snack is easily sharable with others in your party.

Name: Fresh Fruit Waffle Sandwich
Details: The Fresh Fruit Waffle sandwich is located at Sleepy Hollow in the Magic Kingdom. This quick-service restaurant at Magic Kingdom is often overlooked but you can find other delightful creations here as well.
